import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import resumePDF from'../../constants/Zayeem_zaki_resume.pdf';// Import the resume PDF
import{Link}from'react-scroll';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isNavExpanded,setIsNavExpanded]=useState(false);const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);const[subIndex,setSubIndex]=useState(0);const[blink,setBlink]=useState(true);const[reverse,setReverse]=useState(false);const texts=["Zayeem Zaki","Computer Science Student","A Software Developer","A Full Stack Developer"];// Typing Effect Logic
useEffect(()=>{if(subIndex===texts[index].length+1&&!reverse){setReverse(true);return;}if(subIndex===0&&reverse){setReverse(false);setIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%texts.length);return;}const typingDelay=150;// Delay for typing each letter
const deletingDelay=50;// Faster delay for deleting each letter
const timeout=setTimeout(()=>{setSubIndex(prev=>prev+(reverse?-1:1));},reverse?deletingDelay:typingDelay);return()=>clearTimeout(timeout);},[subIndex,index,reverse]);// Blinking Cursor Effect
useEffect(()=>{const timeout2=setTimeout(()=>{setBlink(prev=>!prev);},500);return()=>clearTimeout(timeout2);},[blink]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"hamburger ".concat(isNavExpanded?'open':''),onClick:()=>setIsNavExpanded(!isNavExpanded),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links ".concat(isNavExpanded?'expanded':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"about-me",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"About me"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"skills",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"Skills"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"projects",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"experience",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"Experience"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"certificates",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"Certificates"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"contact-me",spy:true,smooth:true,duration:500,children:"Contact"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:resumePDF,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"resume-link",children:"Resume"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"full-screen-animation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"static-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hello,"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"I'm"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animated-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"".concat(texts[index].substring(0,subIndex)).concat(blink?"|":" ")})})]})]});};export default Navbar;
